content: randaam shushroosha
(kukkiliyon)

vaazhtthuka naathane ennaathmaave!-haale...
Thirunaamatthe ennasthikale!

Vaazhtthuka naathane ennaathmaave!-haale...
Orkkuka thalprathidaanangal.

Mochiccheetum nin paapangal-haale....
Vedanakalkkekum shamanam.

Naashamozhicchavanam cheyyum-haale...
Kaarunyatthaal thaangum ninne.
baarekmor, shubaho ... Menaolam…
(ekkbo-haudatthu in)

snaane ninneyaninjore
mutivinu naathaa!-vetiyaruthe
ninthirumeyu bhakshicchore
dahanan bhakshiccheetaruthe
/tninne-vaazhtthiya vadanangal
/tvilapi-kkaruthe vedanayaal
mruthare sandarshiccha suthaa
krupayatiyaaril che-yyonam.
saumenkaalosu stoumenkalos
promiyon
(thakkeppo-manahamono)

jeevadane! Mruthiyaarnnore
uththaanam-cheyyippone
kshanavum sthothravumattoraam
mruthigathare-jeevippikka.
Laasarine-kallarayinnum
aahvaanam-cheythoru naadaal
vishvaasa-tthotu mruthi poondor-
kkuththaanam- nalkeetename.
moriyo…
Ethro
(kolo-malkkomnahmono)

kykko-lluka naathaa! Nin daasan than samskaare
njangalanaccho-ripparimala dhoopam.
Ithinaa-l nin sharane maranamatanjorkkaashvaasam
smruthiyotoppam-nee nalkeetaname.

Jeeva-pradaraajan; mahimayil vaanattheennumudi-
cchekum-mrutharaam-akhilarkkum jeevan.
Onnaay-mrutharellaam kabareennuththitharaayu,
praanan nalkum ninne-sthothram cheytheetum.
baarekmor. Shubaho …

engaa-thram bhakshicchuyirelum rudhiram paanam
cheyvone njaan-vetiyaa sheeyolil
ennaa-lavanennum jeevippaan njaan mruthanaaye-
nneeshan chonno-raa vachanam sthuthyam.
menaolam…

sneha-tthotetthi; sleebaayaal rakshicchavanaa-
yiniyum vanni-ttaadaamyareyetti
mahimaam-baramekum; jayaveeran eeshonyapane
naam sthothram che-ytthaaraadhikkenam.
(madarosho-pardyso)

navyathayuththaane-karunaabdhe nalka
ninnil nidritharaam-nin daasanmaarkkaayu.

Sodarare! Kaanmin kabarin-samhaaram
marthyaakaaratthe-mruthyu hanikkunnu.
Aadaamin kshayamor-tthee mruthiyil kezhin
/tmruthalokatthil potiyaamee ulakatthin
mohatthe vituvin-karunaapoornnaa! Nin
srushtikkekaname-puthuma uyirppinkal.

Mrutharute homonil-vanneri kaanmin
mruthi koompaaram pol-koottiya maanavar than
durbhagagaathrangal-paazhmanpaathrangal
/tbheekaramasthikalil krumikal kutikolvoo
ithu kandaal thaazhtthum-thala garvishdtanmaar
nashvaralokatthe-snehippor vaatum.

Priyare! Sundarare!-paathaalam pookin
sankataramgatthil-klechchhathaye kaanmin.
Azhakellaam poyi-chamayangal paazhaayu
/tmodam nalkum parimalamillavitengum
aareyumotikkum-durggandham paaram
chaarcchakkaaraneyum-nerituvaan vayyaa.

Nin sharane mrutharaam-janaka bhraathaakkal
saubhaagyasthaana-tthelkkanamaashvaasam
vamshavidhikkaayu nee-aagathanaakum naal
/tunnathamaam yerushalemil ninnatiyaar
modaagaaratthil-vimalanmaaroppam
sthuthi nithyam paataan-bhaagyam netenam.

Svarggapathe! Mruthare jeevippikkaname
nin sharane jeevan-viramippicchoraam
sakala paretharkkum-mochanamekaname.
/tninnute vandinamathilavar -modikkaname.
Avarazhalillaathe-thejodhaarikalaayu
manavaraye modaal-praapiccheetenam.

Sthuthi kaarunyatthaal srushticchon janakaa
sthothram sleebaayaal-rakshicchon thanayaa!
Sthothram praanadanaam-parishuddhaathmaave!
/tnjangalileppozhum mashihaa rakshakane!
Kanivundaakaname-atiyaarum mrutharum
ninne ennennum-sthothram cheytheetum.
(sugeeso-eskaanaashu aahaayu)

sodarare!-kootin enneyo-rttheetuvin
ningate-samsarggam vittene-nneykkum.

Yaathra purappetten, bhojyameni-kkilla
enne ky-kkolvaan priyare! Praarththippin.

Nee krupayaa-lenne mannaal sru-shticchu
paathaki njaan-pookeetaruthe paa-thaalam.

Paathaki njaa-n-enne njaan nindi-kkunnu
amputayo-ne ninnamparththi-kkunnen.

Srushtipathe! Srushticchenne nin-vativil
veezharuthe-narakattheeyil njaa-n naathaa!

Angeraa-neluthallengkil thru-kkanivaal
njaan meva-ttaapatthenye vaa-thilkkal.

Arayil ke-tteetum sleebaayaam-vaalaal
aapalsthaa-natthe nee tharanam-cheyyum.

Eeshan jee-vamayan kabareennum-ninne
edanilekkettum jeevan nee-netum

svarbhaagyam-pookum shuddhanmaa-roppam
neeyaamo-dikkum khedam nee-ngeetum.

Rakshakanaa-meesho! Jeevadane! Enne
jeevippi-kkuka nin krupaye njaa-n vaazhtthum.
moriyo ...
(maar apreminte bovooso)

aardrathayaal naathaa! Devaa!
Daasannekaname punyam
nin mahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaayivane.

Vathsalare paathaalatthin
vazhiyum paarppitavum paartthaan
ningale verpiriyaanenne
ippolaahvaanam cheythu.

Pinnaale vannon doothan
veenaanen meethe vegam
njaanariyaathenne nere
koottikkondayyo poyaan.

Baandhavare kaanaanalppam
nilkkanamennabhyarththicchen
kettillen vaakyam doothan
vaangicchillan kykkooli.

Srashtaavaam thaathan sthuthyan
rakshakanaam puthran vandyan
kabareennum parudeesaayil
cherkkum roohaa sthothraarhan.

Aardrathayaal naathaa! Devaa!
Daasannekaname punyam nin
mahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaayivane.
